FindingName: Kerberos Account Appears to have a Long-lived Password
Description: Kerberos Account with passwords that are older than 180 days were identified. Passwords that remain unchanged for long periods of time are more susceptable to being cracked
Remediation: It is recommended to change the Kerberos account password at least every 180 days.

References.Text: AD Forest Recovery - Resetting the krbtgt password
